meta.title: Watu Care - Medical Supplies for Africa & Middle East
meta.description: Medical devices and PPE from Asian manufacturers. B2B wholesale for healthcare facilities in Africa and the Middle East. Based in Hong Kong.

hero.subtitle: Quality medical devices and PPE from Asia.

whyUs.title: Why Watu Care
whyUs.subtitle: We connect healthcare providers with quality medical supplies from Asia.
whyUs.hubDesc: Strategic location connecting Asian manufacturers directly to healthcare facilities across Africa and the Middle East.
whyUs.directDesc: We work directly with manufacturers to ensure quality products and competitive pricing.
whyUs.serviceDesc: Quick quote turnaround and dedicated support throughout your order process.
whyUs.catalogDesc: Comprehensive range of medical supplies across multiple categories to meet your facility's needs.

categories.title: Our Products
categories.subtitle: Explore our range of medical supplies from Asian manufacturers.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Medical supply solutions across specialized categories

surgical.title: Procedure Packs & Drapes
surgical.description: Pre-assembled sterile kits for surgical procedures.
surgical.longDescription: Complete range of sterile surgical packs including drapes, gowns, and procedure-specific kits. Available in standard and custom configurations to match your facility's protocols.

tube.title: Tubes & Airway Management
tube.description: Endotracheal tubes, masks, and breathing circuits.
tube.longDescription: Full selection of airway management products including endotracheal tubes, oxygen masks, laryngeal masks, and anesthesia circuits. Multiple sizes available for pediatric to adult patients.

central-venous-catheter.title: Anti-Infection Central Venous Catheter
central-venous-catheter.longDescription: Central venous catheters with antimicrobial coating to reduce catheter-related infections. Available in single, double, triple, and quad lumen configurations with complete kit options.

dressing.title: Dressing & Kits
dressing.description: Wound care dressings and sterile procedure kits.
dressing.longDescription: Comprehensive wound care solutions including hydrocolloid, alginate, foam, and film dressings. Also available: surgical tapes, swabs, and complete sterile dressing packs.

laboratory-supplies.title: Laboratory Supplies
laboratory-supplies.description: Specimen collection tubes and diagnostic supplies.
laboratory-supplies.longDescription: Laboratory specimen collection products including vacuum blood collection tubes, urine containers, culture swabs, and safety needles. ISO-certified for diagnostic accuracy.

veterinary-products.title: Veterinary Products
veterinary-products.longDescription: Dedicated veterinary product line including surgical drapes, endotracheal tubes, IV catheters, feeding tubes, and wound care supplies. Sized for various animal patients.

medical-equipment.title: Medical Equipment
medical-equipment.description: Diagnostic devices and patient care equipment.
medical-equipment.longDescription: Essential medical equipment for healthcare facilities including thermometers, blood pressure monitors, pulse oximeters, nebulizers, and hospital beds.

gloves.title: Gloves
gloves.description: Examination and surgical gloves in latex, nitrile, and vinyl.
gloves.longDescription: Full range of medical gloves including latex, nitrile, and vinyl options. Available in examination and sterile surgical grades, powdered or powder-free.

face-protection.title: Face Protection
face-protection.description: Surgical masks and protective face shields.
face-protection.longDescription: Infection control products including 3-ply surgical masks with high bacterial filtration efficiency and reusable face shields for comprehensive facial protection.

bodily-waste-management.title: Bodily Waste Management
bodily-waste-management.description: Emesis bags, bedpans, and drainage systems.
bodily-waste-management.longDescription: Patient care products for waste management including emesis bags, reusable bedpans and urinals, and sterile urine drainage systems.

basic-universal-pack.description: Standard surgical drape kit for general procedures. Includes table covers, drapes, hand towels, and OP-tape in a single sterile pack.

reinforced-universal-pack.description: Universal surgical pack with reinforced gowns for enhanced barrier protection during general surgical procedures.

craniotomy-pack.description: Specialized neurosurgery pack with dedicated craniotomy drape and reinforced gowns for brain surgery procedures.

dental-pack.description: Complete dental procedure kit with dental drape, tube covers, gowns, and hand towels.

shoulder-pack.description: Orthopedic pack configured for shoulder surgery with specialized shoulder drape and suture collection bag.

laparoscopy-pack.description: Minimally invasive surgery kit with laparoscopy drape, yankauer suction set, and lap sponges.

caesarean-section-pack.description: Complete C-section kit including baby wrapper, bulb syringe, umbilical cord clamp, and specialized drapes.

delivery-pack.description: Standard delivery kit with underbuttock drape, leggings, baby wrapper, and essential delivery supplies.

extremity-pack.description: Surgical pack for upper and lower extremity procedures with extremity drape and leggings.

knee-arthroscopy-pack.description: Arthroscopic surgery kit for knee procedures with dedicated drape and U-split drapes for optimal access.

tur-pack.description: Transurethral resection pack with specialized TUR drape for urological procedures.

ent-pack.description: Ear, nose, and throat surgery pack with U-split drape, head drape, and procedure accessories.

hip-pack.description: Hip surgery kit with U-split drape, elastic bandage, and skin marker for orthopedic procedures.

cardiovascular-pack.description: Cardiac surgery pack with large cardiovascular drape and tube cover for heart procedures.

gynecology-pack.description: Gynecological procedure kit with specialized drape and gauze swabs for OB/GYN procedures.

cystoscopy-pack.description: Urological pack for cystoscopy procedures with specialized drape and leggings.

orthopedic-pack.description: Comprehensive orthopedic surgery kit with multiple U-split drapes, yankauer suction, and skin marker.

care-kit.description: Patient care kit with spunlace drape and arm holder accessories for patient positioning.

welcome-pack.description: Patient admission kit with bed cover, quilt cover, pillow, patient gown, and disposable slippers.

warm-air-unit.description: Medical warming unit with LCD display, 8-speed fan, and plasma air purification. For ICU, OR, and ward use.

full-body-blanket.description: Warming blanket compatible with warm air units. For full body temperature management in clinical settings.

endotracheal-tube.description: High-volume, low-pressure cuffed tubes with radiopaque line for accurate X-ray positioning.

adaptive-cuff-ett.description: Advanced cuff technology that adjusts with respiratory frequency to prevent airway mucosal damage.

reinforced-ett.description: Wire-reinforced tubes resistant to kinking while maintaining flexibility for difficult airways.

oxygen-mask.description: Flexible oxygen delivery masks with elastic strap. Delivers 60-80% oxygen concentration.

venturi-mask.description: Precision oxygen masks with color-coded connectors for accurate concentration settings from 24% to 50%.

suction-catheter.description: Yankauer-style suction catheters with lateral eyes for continuous suction flow during procedures.

laryngeal-mask.description: Medical-grade silicone laryngeal mask airway. MRI compatible with colored pilot balloon.

breathing-circuits.description: Anesthesia breathing circuits in corrugated and smoothbore types. ISO standard interfaces.

hme-filters.description: Heat and moisture exchange filters with >99.99% bacterial/viral filtration efficiency.

disposable-cvc.description: Latex-free TPU central venous catheter with soft tip design to reduce vessel trauma.

anti-infection-cvc.description: Antimicrobial-coated catheter with rifampicin and minocycline to reduce infection risk.

hemodialysis-catheter.description: Hemodialysis catheter in TPU and silicone. Precurved and straight options available.

cvc-complete-kit.description: Complete CVC insertion kit with catheter, guidewire, dilator, scalpel, syringes, and drapes.

hydrocolloid-dressing.description: Self-adhesive waterproof dressing that promotes moist wound healing and autolytic debridement.

alginate-dressing.description: High-absorbency calcium alginate dressing for moderate to heavily exuding wounds.

transparent-film-dressing.description: Breathable semi-permeable film for IV sites and minor wounds. Allows wound observation.

foam-dressing.description: Polyurethane foam dressing with non-adherent contact layer for moderate exudate wounds.

island-dressing.description: Sterile adhesive dressing with central absorbent pad and breathable backing.

non-woven-swabs.description: Soft, low-lint non-woven swabs for wound cleaning and dressing procedures.

gauze-swabs.description: Cotton gauze swabs in 12-ply and 16-ply. X-ray detectable thread option available.

adhesive-wound-plaster.description: Ready-to-use adhesive plasters with non-adherent pad for minor cuts and abrasions.

skin-closure-strips.description: Reinforced adhesive strips for non-invasive wound closure. Reduces scarring.

surgical-tape-paper.description: Hypoallergenic microporous paper tape for sensitive skin. Easy to tear by hand.

surgical-tape-silk.description: High-tensile silk tape for secure dressing fixation. Conformable and hand-tearable.

elastic-adhesive-bandage.description: Elastic compression tape with zinc oxide adhesive for support and compression.

dressing-retention-tape.description: Wide non-woven tape for securing large dressings. Hypoallergenic and radiolucent.

tracheostomy-dressing.description: Pre-cut keyhole dressing designed for tracheostomy sites. Non-fraying edges.

dressing-pack-sterile.description: Complete sterile dressing kit with gloves, swabs, and disposal bag. Ready to use.

blood-collection-tube-edta.description: EDTA vacuum tube for hematology testing. K2 or K3 EDTA anticoagulant.

blood-collection-tube-serum.description: Plain vacuum tube for serum collection. Clot activator and gel separator options.

blood-collection-tube-sodium-citrate.description: Sodium citrate tube for coagulation testing (PT, APTT). Precise 9:1 blood ratio.

blood-collection-tube-fluoride.description: Sodium fluoride tube with glycolysis inhibitor for accurate glucose testing.

safety-blood-collection-needle.description: Safety needle with shield mechanism to prevent needlestick injuries. Ultra-thin wall.

urine-container-sterile.description: Leak-proof sterile container with screw cap and graduated markings for urine collection.

stool-container.description: Specimen container with integrated spoon for fecal sample collection. Wide mouth design.

transport-swab-viral.description: Nylon flocked swab with viral transport medium for virus detection and PCR testing.

culture-swab-bacterial.description: Culture swab with Amies or Stuart transport medium for bacterial specimen collection.

vet-surgical-drape-pack.description: Sterile surgical drape pack for veterinary procedures. SMS or spunlace material.

vet-endotracheal-tube.description: Veterinary endotracheal tubes in wide size range for various animal patients.

vet-iv-catheter.description: Peripheral IV catheter for veterinary use with color-coded hub and ultra-sharp needle.

vet-feeding-tube.description: Nasogastric or orogastric feeding tube for animal patients. Radiopaque with graduated markings.

vet-urinary-catheter.description: Sterile urinary catheter for veterinary drainage. Smooth rounded tip with dual eyes.

vet-surgical-gloves.description: Sterile surgical gloves for veterinary surgery. Latex or nitrile options.

vet-wound-dressing.description: Absorbent wound dressings for animal wound care. Non-adherent pad with breathable backing.

vet-bandage-cohesive.description: Self-adherent elastic bandage that sticks to itself, not to fur. Multiple colors available.

digital-thermometer.description: Fast digital thermometer for oral, axillary, or rectal use. Accuracy ±0.1°C.

infrared-forehead-thermometer.description: Non-contact infrared thermometer for quick temperature screening. 1-second reading.

blood-pressure-monitor-digital.description: Automatic upper arm blood pressure monitor with irregular heartbeat detection.

pulse-oximeter-fingertip.description: Portable pulse oximeter for SpO2 and pulse rate monitoring. OLED display.

stethoscope-dual-head.description: Classic dual-head acoustic stethoscope with stainless steel chest piece.

nebulizer-compressor.description: Electric compressor nebulizer for respiratory medication delivery. Includes adult and pediatric masks.

oxygen-concentrator.description: Medical-grade oxygen concentrator delivering 90-96% oxygen. Portable and stationary models.

examination-light-led.description: LED examination light with adjustable arm. Shadow-free illumination for clinical exams.

hospital-bed-manual.description: Manual hospital bed with 2-crank or 3-crank adjustment. Steel frame with side rails.

latex-exam-gloves-powdered.description: Ambidextrous latex exam gloves with cornstarch powder for easy donning.

latex-exam-gloves-powder-free.description: Powder-free latex exam gloves. Polymer coated for easy donning without powder.

nitrile-exam-gloves-powder-free.description: Latex-free nitrile gloves with superior puncture and chemical resistance.

nitrile-exam-gloves-extended-cuff.description: Extended cuff nitrile gloves (30cm) for added forearm protection.

vinyl-exam-gloves-powder-free.description: Economical vinyl gloves for low-risk, short-duration tasks. Latex-free.

surgical-gloves-latex-powdered.description: Sterile anatomical latex surgical gloves with textured surface for instrument grip.

surgical-gloves-latex-powder-free.description: Powder-free sterile latex surgical gloves with low protein content.

surgical-gloves-nitrile-powder-free.description: Latex-free nitrile surgical gloves with excellent chemical resistance.

surgical-gloves-double-gloving.description: Color-coded double gloving system for puncture detection in high-risk procedures.

orthopedic-surgical-gloves.description: Extra-thick surgical gloves in neoprene or polyisoprene for orthopedic procedures.

heavy-duty-utility-gloves.description: Reusable rubber gloves for cleaning and disinfection. Chemical-resistant.

cpe-gloves.description: Disposable polyethylene gloves for food handling and light-duty tasks.

glove-liners-cotton.description: Absorbent cotton liners to improve comfort during prolonged glove use. Washable.

radiation-protection-gloves.description: Lead or lead-free protective gloves for radiology and fluoroscopy procedures.

surgical-mask-3ply.description: Disposable 3-ply surgical mask with BFE ≥95%. Nose clip and ear loops included.

face-shield-reusable.description: Full-face protective shield with anti-fog coating. Adjustable headband, reusable.

emesis-bag-vomit-bag.description: Disposable leak-proof emesis bag with graduated markings. Compact and portable.

bedpan-reusable.description: Durable bedpan in stainless steel or plastic. Contoured design for patient comfort.

urinal-bottle-reusable.description: Graduated urinal for male patients with ergonomic handle and leak-proof cap.

urine-bag-drainage.description: Sterile closed drainage bag with anti-reflux valve for catheterized patients.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps to get the medical supplies you need.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Share your product requirements, quantities, and delivery location through our quote form.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our team reviews your request and provides a quote with shipping and logistics details.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Once approved, we handle procurement and shipping until your order arrives.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about working with Watu Care.
faq.moqQuestion: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
faq.moqAnswer: MOQ varies by product category. For most items, we work with quantities suitable for healthcare facilities of all sizes. Contact us with your specific needs and we'll provide tailored options.
faq.deliveryAnswer: Delivery times depend on your location and order size. Typically, orders to Africa and the Middle East take 2-4 weeks after confirmation. We provide tracking information for all shipments.
faq.regionsQuestion: Which regions do you deliver to?
faq.regionsAnswer: We deliver to healthcare facilities across Africa and the Middle East. Our Hong Kong hub enables efficient shipping to major ports and logistics centers throughout these regions.
faq.certificationsQuestion: What certifications do your products have?
faq.certificationsAnswer: Our products come from manufacturers that meet international quality standards including CE marking and ISO certifications. We can provide specific certification documents upon request.
faq.paymentQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept bank transfers (T/T) and letters of credit (L/C) for larger orders. Payment terms are discussed during the quotation process based on order size and relationship.
faq.supportQuestion: What after-sales support do you provide?
faq.supportAnswer: Our team provides support throughout the order process and after delivery. We assist with product inquiries, documentation, and any issues that may arise with your order.
